about_the_game:
Purchasing this add-on unlocks Hwang as a playable character in the main game of SOULCALIBUR VI, as well as an exclusive story for Hwang in Soul Chronicle.

The secret royal blademaster Hwang joins the fray, rounding out Season Pass 2 in his first appearance since SOULCALIBUR III!
Take down the servants of evil using Hwang's patented sword techniques and nimble kicks, as well as powerful new "lifeforce techniques"!

DLC Content:
- Hwang as a playable character
- Additional story of Hwang in "STORY: Soul Chronicle"
- Additional items for use in Character Creation (11 total)
- Additional weapons (7 total)
- Additional titles (4 total)
- Additional battle comments (2 total)
detailed_description:
Purchasing this add-on unlocks Hwang as a playable character in the main game of SOULCALIBUR VI, as well as an exclusive story for Hwang in Soul Chronicle.

The secret royal blademaster Hwang joins the fray, rounding out Season Pass 2 in his first appearance since SOULCALIBUR III!
Take down the servants of evil using Hwang's patented sword techniques and nimble kicks, as well as powerful new "lifeforce techniques"!

DLC Content:
- Hwang as a playable character
- Additional story of Hwang in "STORY: Soul Chronicle"
- Additional items for use in Character Creation (11 total)
- Additional weapons (7 total)
- Additional titles (4 total)
- Additional battle comments (2 total)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

short_description: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Hwang!
